sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './AboutUs.css'; const AboutUs =() =>{ return

Our Pumpkin Movie Website provide users a better way to buy their ideal movie tickets online. Users can find the movie descriptions, movie time, movie genres, movie ratings. Users can also get the information of different movie theatres in the United States, they can find the nearest movie theatres, locations and contact information. Besides, Users can find the show times for different movies in different theaters. Imagine you are looking for a movie to watch with your friends. On our website, you can get the movie you like, choose the perfect time and nearest movie theatre. How fantastic it is! Our target users are young people who prefer an easier way to enjoy a moive and always persue a better viewing experiences in the theatres.

Our website is connected to three databases. We use python to scrape the data through the APIs these three database provides. We use full stack MERN to build this website. We use React for front end, Express and Node.js for back end development. We created our own MongoDB database to hold all data scraped from the online databases and rearrange them in a way we like.

}; export default AboutUs;
